intro: Uncover the dark truth behind a luxury space station orbiting Mars.
description:
Welcome To Mars 9: The Tale Of River is a classic-style graphic adventure about a person adrift in space who is rescued by a luxurious space station orbiting Mars. Playing as River, you'll immerse yourself in a world of comfort and pleasure—until you realize the station hides a dark secret.

In Welcome To Mars 9: The Tale Of River, you'll navigate the station's lavish leisure facilities, using your wits to solve puzzles and move forward. As the story unfolds, you’ll begin to uncover the sinister side of the station and must choose whether to ignore it or take action.

The choices you make in Welcome To Mars 9: The Tale Of River will challenge your ethics and test your morality. Will you do whatever it takes to protect yourself and survive, or risk everything to expose the truth and stop what's happening on board?

The game's pixel art style creates a stunning, immersive world that captures the spirit of classic adventure games. From the luxurious amenities to the station’s shadowy corners, every location in Welcome To Mars 9: The Tale Of River is full of character and ready to be explored. Its gripping story will keep you on the edge of your seat. With multiple endings to discover, this is a game you'll want to replay.

Are you ready to embark on a journey of self-discovery and uncover the dark secrets of the space station orbiting Mars?
